ENG.shop_admin_confirm_cancel: Cancel the order?? Order completed. Cancellation of this order will return the items to the shelves of the store and move the order to New. Make sure that the customer exactly refused the purchase.

ENG.shop_admin_confirm_to_done: Mark the order as completed? The items from the order will be removed from the store and marked as sold. You can cancel the order at any time.
ENG.shop_admin_confirm_to_trash_new: Remove the order? The order is new and unprocessed. Deleting this order doesn't entail any changes. Make sure that the customer exactly refused the purchase.
